005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapKey;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.HashMap;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Map;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027public final class MapPut {
028  @NonNull
029  public static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
030      .name("put")
031      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
032      .deterministic()
033      .contextIndependent()
034      .focusIndependent()
035      .argument(IArgument.builder()
036          .name("map")
037          .type(IMapItem.class)
038          .one()
039          .build())
040      .argument(IArgument.builder()
041          .name("key")
042          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
043          .one()
044          .build())
045      .argument(IArgument.builder()
046          .name("value")
047          .type(IItem.class)
048          .zeroOrMore()
049          .build())
050      .returnType(IMapItem.class)
051      .returnOne()
052      .functionHandler(MapPut::execute)
053      .build();
054
055  private MapPut() {
056    // disable construction
057  }
058
059  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
060  @NonNull
061  private static <V extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
062      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
063      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
064      IItem focus) {
065    IMapItem<V> map = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
066    IAnyAtomicItem key = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
067    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked") V value = (V) ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(2)).toCollectionValue();
068
069    return put(map, key, value).asSequence();
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
074   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-put">map:put</a>.
075   *
076   * @param <V>
077   *          the type of items in the given Metapath map
078   * @param map
079   *          the map of Metapath items that is to be modified
080   * @param key
081   *          the key for the value to add to the map
082   * @param value
083   *          the value to add to the map
084   * @return the modified map
085   */
086  @NonNull
087  public static <V extends ICollectionValue> IMapItem<V> put(
088      @NonNull IMapItem<V> map,
089      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key,
090      @NonNull V value) {
091    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap") Map<IMapKey, V> copy = new HashMap<>(map);
092    copy.put(key.asMapKey(), value);
093
094    return IMapItem.ofCollection(copy);
095  }
096}
